pages.text: $(m)no$() Yes! Mana is now displayed with clear numerical values alongside the familiar progress bars, giving you precise insight into how much mana is stored or required.$(br)This applies to many components throughout the mod, including:$(li)Mana Pools$(li)Terra Plates$(li)Runic Altars$(li)Mana-holding items

This makes tracking, planning, and automating mana usage easier than ever. For even more detail, holding Shift reveals values in millibuckets (mB), following standard Forge fluid conventions.$(br)Let numbers guide your magical efficiency!
